item.title: Horizontal Scaling MySQL group replication
item.description: New to KubeDB? Please start here. This is an Enterprise-only feature. Please install KubeDB Enterprise Edition to try this feature. Horizontal Scale MySQL Group Replication This guide will show you how to use KubeDB enterprise operator to increase/decrease the number of members of a MySQL Group Replication. Before You Begin At first, you need to have a Kubernetes cluster, and the kubectl command-line tool must be configured to communicate with your cluster.
